abstract: Four other people were injured, at least one critically, when the chopper tried to land at the East 34th Street Heliport, then pulled back up and spun into the river, dropping 40 feet to the muddy bottom.
snippet: Four other people were injured, at least one critically, when the chopper tried to land at the East 34th Street Heliport, then pulled back up and spun into the river, dropping 40 feet to the muddy bottom.

headline.main: Live Blog: Woman Dies in Helicopter Crash in East River
